spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The aartuk casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}):

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The aartuk can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aartuk makes two Branch attacks, two Radiant Pellet attacks, or one of each.

action.name: Branch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Radiant Pellet
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) radiant damage.

bonus.name: Tongue {@recharge}
entries: The aartuk tries to use its gooey tongue to snare one Large or smaller creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition grappled} by the tongue (escape {@dc 14}) and pulled up to 25 feet toward the aartuk. The tongue can grapple one creature at a time.
